tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    packaging_material VARCHAR(255),
    packaging_weight FLOAT,
    carbon_footprint FLOAT,
    recycling_code VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE ProductPackaging (
  packaging_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  material_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products (product_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES PackagingMaterials (material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    impact_score DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Product(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES PackagingMaterials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR,
  product_category VARCHAR,
  packaging_material_id INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_packaging_material FOREIGN KEY (packaging_material_id) REFERENCES packaging_materials(id)
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  material_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  recyclable BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE product_information (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  product_description TEXT,
  packaging_material_id INT REFERENCES packaging_materials(material_id)
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  impact_type VARCHAR(50),
  impact_description TEXT,
  environmental_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE product_impact (
  product_id INT REFERENCES product_information(product_id),
  impact_id INT REFERENCES environmental_impact(impact_id),
  impact_value INT
)

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT
)
